title: Charter Hall, Abacus Property sell out of AOF
text:
Charter Hall and Abacus Property Group have cashed out of takeover target ASX-listed Australian Unity Office Fund.

One of Australian Unity Office Fund's nine office towers. Supplied

JPMorgan began offering Charter Hall and Abacus' 19.9 per cent stake in the listed fund on Wednesday night.

According to terms sent to fund managers, the offer price was pegged at $2.95 a share, a 1.3 per cent discount to the last traded price of $2.99. At that price, the offer size was $96 million.

Books closed at 6.30pm this evening with the trade to take place tonight.

more to come.
description: Charter Hall and Abacus Property Group have cashed out of takeover target ASX-listed Australian Unity Office Fund.
